name: ISIS Simulator
description:
You are soldier, enemy are ISIS. Soldier is good, ISIS is bad. ISIS are terrorist, soldier kill terrorist. Soldier goal is find and kill all ISIS terrorist then escape. There are many ISIS for soldier to kill and a lot of fun for player to play ISIS Simulator. Good luck!

Features:
  • Fight Terrorists
  • Challenging gameplay
  • Different ISIS enemies to kill
  • Various weapons to find and use
